Title: WEEKOFYEAR()
Description:
Returns the calendar week of the date as a number in the range
          from 1 to 53. Returns
          NULL if date is
          NULL.

WEEKOFYEAR() is a compatibility
          function that is equivalent to
          WEEK(date,3).

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SELECT WEEKOFYEAR('2008-02-20');
        -> 8
